title: Ping Issues
body:
I've played a couple of ARAM and 5v5 games where the Ping would jump from 60 to 3000 all in a span of two seconds.  I haven't seen where there are maybe issues with servers, but I would like to know about why we're seeing such a spike while in game! Others players in the game would be dealing with the same thing, so it's not too fun to have three minute lag in game. I'm on an NA server if that helps. 

Thank you.

replies.body:
Since your ping spikes incredibly high, it appears that there is some sort of connection issue to the individual game server that is causing your ping to spike.  It can sometimes be fairly tricky to identify exactly why this is occurring, so make sure to complete all of the steps in our [Connection Issues Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664).  It has the most common solutions that should get your ping stable once again.

Give me a heads up if you are still experiencing some issues!

Heya
Would you want to create a tracert (to check your connection)?
Just get [Pingplotter](https://www.pingplotter.com/downloads/pingplotter_install.exe)(demo version).
Adress to Trace: 192.64.170.252
Trace Intervall: 1 second

Then you start a testgame and let the programm run in the backround. After the game, if you had problems, **post a screenshot from the programm** and export the tracert as txt. You can upload the tracert using the [wrenchmen Upload tool](http://upload.leaguevolunteers.com/).
Once you finished uploading just post the links here so that i can have a look at the files.


Regards Rkoturdo
